sentences.sContent: And the next day, he gave a speech in Ohio about faith.
sentences.sContent_eng: And the next day, he gave a speech in Ohio about faith.
sentences.sCn: 第二天，他还在俄亥俄州做一场关于信仰的演讲。

sentences.sContent: They grew up in Canton, Ohio, and on the day of the Normandy invasion, they were both dropped in.
sentences.sContent_eng: They grew up in Canton, Ohio, and on the day of the Normandy invasion, they were both dropped in.
sentences.sCn: 他们一起在俄亥俄州的康顿长大，又在诺曼底登陆的那一天，一起跳了下去。
